sentences.en: Fishermen fear valuable oyster and mussel beds could be decimated.
sentences.cn: 渔民们害怕宝贵的牡蛎和贻贝层会被破坏。

sentences.en: Fortunately, in previous years, the Festival Flea Lille also mussel festival to at the same time.
sentences.cn: 好在同往年一样, 里尔旧货节还同时举行淡菜节.

sentences.en: In the shallows, the dark, water-soakedsticks and twigs, smooth and old, were undulating in clusters on the bottomagainst the clean ribbed sand, and the track of the mussel was plain.
sentences.cn: 滩头水浅处，湖底沙地干净整洁，纹路层叠，贻贝爬过的痕迹清晰可辨，另有长短不一的枝桠成簇在水底摇摆不定，或光滑或腐朽，一律给湖水浸得发乌。

sentences.en: It rises to stand from Beijing, edge way by port of Tianjin, Jinan, Xuzhou, mussel.
sentences.cn: 它起自北京站, 沿途径由天津 、 济南 、 徐州 、 蚌埠.

sentences.en: Mussel crisp delicious, packet sauce tasty, traditional cuisine of coastal Wenzhou.
sentences.cn: 淡菜脆嫩鲜香, 包汁入味, 是温州沿海的传统佳肴.

sentences.en: Paul is then left to choose one box to open to retrieve the mussel.
sentences.cn: 然后让保罗选择打开其中一个箱子来获得贻贝。

sentences.en: Pisaster has everted its stomach out through its mouth, and it'sdigesting the mussel externally.
sentences.cn: 海星通过嘴部把胃翻了出来，它正从外部消化这只贻贝。

sentences.en: Rich oyster, mussel, clam, snail, seaweed, laver and other shellfish, algae.
sentences.cn: 盛产牡蛎 、 蛏 、 蛤 、 螺 、 海带 、 紫菜等贝 、 藻类.

sentences.en: That's how scientists think the destructive and oft - pilloried mussel got into the Great Lakes.
sentences.cn: 科学家认为臭名昭著的斑马贝就是这样到达北美五大湖的.

sentences.en: The dry prodnets: bake fish , while squid bake eel fish, mussel meat and so on.
sentences.cn: 干燥产品: 烤鱼片 、 整体鱿鱼、烤鳗 、 贻贝等.

sentences.en: The relevant factors that may limit or prevent the spread of the zebra mussel are uncertain.
sentences.cn: 可以限制或阻止斑马贻贝扩展的相关因素是不确定的.

words.tran_cn: 蚌；[无脊椎]贻贝；[水产]淡菜
